benchmark_details.name: STEER-BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: STEER-BENCH is a benchmark for assessing population-specific steering using contrasting Reddit communities. It evaluates how effectively large language models (LLMs) understand community-specific instructions and their ability to represent diverse cultural and ideological perspectives.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the steerability of LLMs towards diverse community perspectives and understand how they align with community-specific norms and ideologies.

data.source: Reddit data collected from contrasting subreddit pairs.
data.annotation: Validated by human annotators for accuracy.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated as the proportion of model responses that match the silver labels generated by human annotators.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better alignment with community norms and better steerability of the model.
methodology.validation: Human annotation study for question-answer pairs to ensure correct representation of community perspectives.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The work relies on publicly available Reddit data, and measures are taken to protect user privacy and aggregate content.
